summary: A complete rework of the drug system in Skyrim. Adding new lore friendly drugs from previous elderscrolls games. Adding new visual effects to all drugs and alcohol. Adding new dealers to four holds. Reworked stats for all drugs.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is basically an overhaul of the drug system in Skyrim.
This mod will do the following-

Adds six new lore friendly drugs from previous elderscrolls games.
Which are-

* Hist sap
* Felldew
* Greenmote
* Redwater skooma
* Essence of sleeping tree
* Unrefined moonsugar

Adds new drug dealers to four holds that blend in seamlessly and have their own little life.
You can find them in-

* Riften (ragged flagon)
* Windhelm
* Markarth
* Solitude (docks)

Adds all new drugs to all three khajiit caravans.

Adds the new drugs around the world but they are rare and mainly kept by bandits.

Adds new custom visuals for all drugs and alcoholic beverages.

Adds a drug dealers den northwest of Riften with a tough fight for some good loot.

All drugs work differently from each other some have strong visual effects, some have subtle visuals. Some drugs will hit you instantly, some will come on slowly. This makes using drugs in fights real interesting because you might use a drug get the points bonus and then once the bonus has left, you may find you self lost in a swarm of hallucination.

Also reworked all stats and prices for all drugs. Now drugs are more expensive but they are generally more powerful. For example skooma now will cost around 500 septims and have a fortify stamina and regeneration of 100 points. If the skooma is to expensive for you try one of the other cheaper substances, there is something for all Skyrims dope heads hear.
author: Jamie E Graham
